Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui

Class DiagramWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.CanvasWindow
      • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.DiagramWindow

  • public class DiagramWindow
extends CanvasWindow
    A class of windows for displaying and interacting with interaction diagrams.

      • handleMouseEvent

        protected void handleMouseEvent​(int id,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                int clickCount)
        Called when the user presses (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_PRESSED), releases (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_RELEASED), or drags (id == MouseEvent.MOUSE_DRAGGED) the mouse.
        Overrides:
        handleMouseEvent in class CanvasWindow
        Parameters:
        id - The type of mouseEvent (PRESSSED, RELEASED, DRAGGED).
        x - The x value where the mouseEvent happened.
        y - The y value where the mouseEvent happened.
        clickCount - How many clicks there were.

      • handleKeyEvent

        protected void handleKeyEvent​(int id,
                              int keyCode,
                              char keyChar,
                              int keyModifiers)

        Overrides:
        handleKeyEvent in class CanvasWindow
        Parameters:
        id - the type of mouseEvent (PRESSSED, TYPED).
        keyCode - The key code for the event.
        keyChar - The key char for the event.
        keyModifiers - The key modifiers.

        public void setPaintBoard​(PaintBoard paintBoard)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Set the paint board of this diagram window to match the given one.
        Parameters:
        paintBoard - The new paint board for this window.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given paint board's associated window does not equal this diagram window.
